issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Allow users to override physical optimization rules
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12361](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12361). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As a user of DataFusion (in Ballista) I would override the list of physical optimization rules. It is currently possible to add new rules but not to remove existing rules.
